messages.content: How do you install the ComfyUI-extensions?
To install the ComfyUI-extensions, download any of the folders and place them in the /web/extensions or a subdirectory in your ComfyUI directory.
How can I install all the ComfyUI-extensions at once?
You can install all the ComfyUI-extensions at once by running the command `git clone https://github.com/diffus3/ComfyUI-extensions ./web/extensions/diffus3` in your ComfyUI directory.
Are the ComfyUI-extensions fully polished and guaranteed to work?
No, the ComfyUI-extensions are not fully polished and some of them might even be outright broken.
